POWERED by FUSION

An individual post follows.

Let’s Not Blow It Like GB

The Observer confirms that bad infrastructure decisions – like, say, spending a shitload on painfully insecure Microsoft systems – can undermine public confidence in eGovernment. Poor support and publicity for these services doesn’t help the situation much. We’re already on the same path to eGov failure that Great Britain has travelled. Do we have to walk it ourselves, or can we learn from others?

—Jul 21, 2003
